title: Follow Up on an Old Lead
description: An agent needs to re-engage a buyer lead that went cold 6 months ago.

tasks.description: Find the lead's profile in the CRM and review past communications and search criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the history for the old lead.

tasks.description: Draft a friendly, no-pressure follow-up email to see if they are still in the market for a home.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a personalized and engaging re-engagement email.

tasks.description: Send the email and set a task to follow up again in one week if there is no response.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the email and schedules a follow-up task.
